name: hats-installer
description: Installer software for hats: Hive Agile Testing Solution

scripts.build-all: npm run build-chals && npm run build-pages && npm run build-zhtw && npm run build-ja
scripts.pack-mac: electron-packager . HATS-Installer --platform=darwin --arch=x64   --overwrite --ignore=/out/ --prune=true --out=out  --app-copyright='© 2017 GovTech. All Rights Reserved.
scripts.pack-lin: electron-packager . HATS-Installer --platform=linux  --arch=x64   --overwrite --ignore=/out/ --prune=true --out=out  --app-copyright='© 2017 GovTech. All Rights Reserved.
scripts.pack-win: electron-packager . HATS-Installer --platform=win32  --arch=ia32  --overwrite --ignore=/out/ --prune=true --out=out --app-copyright='© 2017 GovTech. All Rights Reserved.'
